description: blue portfolio with white cover; red and black text; curved, black snake surrounded by red dots frames the title; contains accordion-folded booklet with blocky, indented black and white prints of humans and animals, interspersed with text; lender's archive #76
markings: Numbered in pencil on last page: 25/25
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed and dated in pencil on last page: Carolyn Trant │2002
title: Animal Friends: A Cautionary Tale to Exercise the Imagination
